title: karencho
author: karencho
content: Hello i have found arbitrage opportunity on uniswap but when i increase amount of an investment it disappears it was about 2% amoutn below 100$ was fine but above and it disappears why? it is not possible to invest more then 100$?

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: karencho on February 23, 2023, 08:20:10 PMHello i have found arbitrage opportunity on uniswap but when i increase amount of an investment it disappears it was about 2% amoutn below 100$ was fine but above and it disappears why? it is not possible to invest more then 100$?Same with Pancake. It may just be related to the Automated market maker that adjusts prices quickly for the liquidity provider to benefit inside the platform.  The arbitrage traders are not the priority of the DEX for you to stay and keep trading, it's those who provide liquidity. How much would you earn per transaction with $100?  If it doesn't motivate arbitrage traders, you just hope they can read your post for they may just need to do something with it.

comments.author: karencho
comments.body: it was 2.5 usdc from 100$ investment... i dont think that price was adjusted... because arbitrage were remained 4-5 hours... i dont know how to manage it to make good profit

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Quote from: karencho on February 23, 2023, 08:20:10 PMHello i have found arbitrage opportunity on uniswap but when i increase amount of an investment it disappears it was about 2% amoutn below 100$ was fine but above and it disappears why? it is not possible to invest more then 100$?I believe this has something to do with the altcoin's liquidity pool.  It looks like here is no enough funds to maintain the price of an alt coin so it readjust and calculates prices according to how it can afford.  If you can notice the impact part of the deal before we click the trade button.  The higher the impact our trade is the more likely it will affect the final price of the cyptocurrency.

comments.author: karencho
comments.body: so how to get the aritrage that wont fail on higher amounts?

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: karencho on February 24, 2023, 11:52:30 PMso how to get the aritrage that wont fail on higher amounts?How does this arbitrage exactly looked like? I mean there is no way someone will give you correct answer not even knowing if it was either triangular arbitrage on single DEX, cross pool arbitrage using different tokens, or CEX/DEX arbitrage. What slippage there was etc. Give all data and I'll try to tell you why your arbitrage failed.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: karencho on February 24, 2023, 11:52:30 PMso how to get the aritrage that wont fail on higher amounts?Centralized exchanges cause where you will have enough liquidity for higher amounts for almost every tradeable coins and tokens. Lack of liquidity is the reason why you can push your trade limits to higher amounts but beware while doing arbitrage trading its almost gambling and price changes too quickly since its the nature of cryptocurrencies.

There reason why crypto prices are the same on every exchange is made only by professional arbitrate traders. There are no professional gamblers. You only have to do it wise and with good softwere.Quote from: karencho on February 25, 2023, 09:55:44 PMi have dm youI would rather like to answer you here so that others can learn too.In a DM you were talking about super illiquid trading pair on ghost town (AKA uniswap V2) where total daily volume according to CMC = 50$. Most likely slippage was the reason why you did not earn on this trade.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: karencho on February 23, 2023, 08:20:10 PMHello i have found arbitrage opportunity on uniswap but when i increase amount of an investment it disappears it was about 2% amoutn below 100$ was fine but above and it disappears why? it is not possible to invest more then 100$?Probably you are thinking of the price on uniswap could gain more profits from other cex but take not that in a dex, the liquidity matters. Maybe the price does reflect higher in there but when someone take out a high portion of liquidity it revert to a lower price to tie up the liquidity pool eventually going back to normal rate.

comments.author: Marti Panadero
comments.body: I think, from what you've said, it looks like the opportunity was present for investments under $100, but once you tried to invest more than that, the opportunity disappeared. It's hard to say for sure why this is happening, but it's possible that the liquidity on the platform is not high enough to support larger trades. In other words, there may not be enough sellers or buyers on the platform to handle trades of a certain size, which could cause the arbitrage opportunity to disappear when you try to invest more. Alternatively, it could be that the market conditions have changed and the opportunity is no longer available at larger investment amounts. I would recommend doing some further research and analysis to see if you can identify any other factors that might be causing this issue.
